design_philosophy.vibe: Tactile, High-Density, Gamer-Chic, Dark Mode Native
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Discord's native aesthetic with 'Cyber-Security' dashboard vibes.
Emotion First: Users should feel powerful and in control.
Content is King: Data density is high, but hierarchy is strict.
Negative Space: Use it to group functional areas, not just for decoration.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode. Neon accents against deep charcoal.

usage_rules: UI Labels and Body text use 'Inter'.
IDs, Tokens, Logs, and Code Snippets MUST use 'JetBrains Mono'.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous (p-6, p-8) for containers, Tight (gap-2, gap-4) for data density.
rules: Sidebar Navigation: Fixed width (240px-280px), full height.
Dashboard Home: Bento grid layout (mix of 1x1, 2x1, 2x2 tiles).
Settings Pages: Single column, max-width-3xl, centered or left-aligned.

cards.style: Flat background (#2B2D31), 1px border (#1E1F22), no shadow by default.
cards.hover: Border color shifts to Primary (#5865F2), subtle scale (1.01).

buttons.primary: bg-[#5865F2] hover:bg-[#4752C4] text-white rounded-md font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_4px_0_0_rgba(0,0,0,0.2)] active:shadow-none active:translate-y-[2px]

inputs.style: bg-[#1E1F22] border-none text-white placeholder:text-gray-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#5865F2]

navigation.sidebar_item: flex items-center gap-3 px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-gray-400 hover:bg-[#3F4147] hover:text-gray-100 transition-colors aria-[current=page]:bg-[#404249] aria-[current=page]:text-white

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used ONLY for sticky headers and modal overlays (backdrop-blur-md bg-black/40).

assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (for more weight).

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' to match the 'Electric Void' palette exactly. Override the default shadcn variables.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component with a fixed sidebar and scrollable main area.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'radius' variable usage if it conflicts with the specific rounded-md look.
5. PAGES: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the Dashboard Home.
6. CRITICAL: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark backgrounds. Use 'text-gray-300' for secondary text, not darker.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, sidebar links).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large hero title.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for any ID, hash, or code-like data.
Ensure the 'Active' state of sidebar links is visually distinct (bg color + text color change).
Never use native HTML alerts or confirms. Use Shadcn Dialogs.
